sentences.en: A complete line of Horizontal Wet Process Equipment Incorporating Ramjet Technology.
sentences.cn: 结合冲压式技术,一条完整的湿流程设备水平线.

sentences.en: A new supersonic combustion ramjet, or scramjet, engine gets put through its paces at a NASA research center in a ground-based test that simulated Mach 5 conditions in 2008.
sentences.cn: 在美国宇航局研究中心，一个新的超音速燃烧冲压喷气发动机（scramjet）通过了模拟2008年5月5日环境的地面测试。

sentences.en: The objective of these studies is to gather data that enable them to adapt the test chamber for ramjet tests.
sentences.cn: 的目的，这些研究是收集数据，使他们能够适应的试验室的冲压发动机试验。

sentences.en: The rockets give the planes and missiles enoughspeed to make the ramjet engine workable.
sentences.cn: 这种助推火箭为飞机和导弹提供足够的速度,以使冲压式喷气发动机可以开动工作.

trans.tran_en: a type of jet engine in which fuel is burned in a duct using air compressed by the forward speed of the aircraft
